mapper.select: SELECT cr.cafe_no, cr.review_content, cr.review_no, cr.review_regdate, u.id, u.password, u.nickname, u.enabled FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(order by review_no DESC) AS rnum, c.cafe_no, r.review_content, r.review_no, r.id, TO_CHAR(r.review_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS review_regdate FROM cafe c, review r WHERE c.cafe_no = r.cafe_no AND c.cafe_no = #{cafeNo}) cr, rs_user u WHERE cr.id = u.id AND rnum BETWEEN #{pagingBean.startRowNumber} AND #{pagingBean.endRowNumber} ORDER BY cr.review_no DESC

SELECT c.cafe_no, c.cafe_name, u.id, u.password, u.nickname, u.enabled, r.review_no, r.review_content, r.review_regdate FROM cafe c, review r, rs_user u WHERE c.cafe_no = r.cafe_no AND u.id = r.id AND review_no=#{value}
